title: Perennial Night
content:
I moved to perennial night
I am calm and usually alone
I speak a foreign language to foreigners. Here I speak
Their language although it is not my own
Forever colored lights in the distance give me some hope though
I am partially blind in the dark.
Come find me. I am as close
As your fingers. My heart
Rhythms like yours
Even as I am hidden
I am easy to find
I could be you

https://youtu.be/1QtE_S7NdDw
